_xResult.title: Noah Linen Harem Pants
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made drop crotch pants with elastic waistband
_xResult.longdesc:
If you're new to the world of harem pants, we've got to let you in on it—they are a game changer. Wide and loose fitting with an elastic waistband, they allow you comfort and movement and can be worn to a wide variety of activities. From yoga to lounging at home to parties and festivals , harem pants are at home nearly everywhere. And they even have pockets! 

 

These particular pants are made out of 100% medium-weight linen and come pre-washed so they're extremely soft and won't shrink anymore They are available in 31 different colors so be sure to check out the color palette in the last picture and provide your color preference during checkout. 

 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees that it meets human-ecological requirements.

properties.propvalue: Gentle machine wash on low temperatures with soft washing agents. Machine drying in the most gentle way, please use cool temperature. Avoid overdrying.  No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
